name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior MLOps Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I leverage my deep expertise in **Python** and **MLOps** to build and scale machine learning solutions. Proficient in using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, I enhance deployment processes and streamline orchestrations for robust machine learning pipelines. My background in **Data Engineering** and **Distributed Computing** ensures that I construct scalable systems to efficiently handle large datasets. I have hands-on experience with **Pipeline Orchestrators** such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**, and I'm skilled in implementing best practices for **Data Structures** and **Algorithms** to optimize model performance.
Alongside technical skills, my proficiency in frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**, as well as front-end technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, complements my ability to develop high-performance solutions tailored for healthcare and financial sectors. My cloud expertise spans **AWS** and **Azure**, where I've led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities. I maintain strict compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, ensuring the security and robustness of applications deployed in production.
